set.name: DMBD-20 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Magic Tool

property.name: Race
property.value: Dolszak/Mafi Gang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Fantasy Gate of Moonless Night: When you put a Magic Tool creature or cast a Magic Tool spell, you may choose a total of 4 Magic Tools from the battle zone and/or graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature with spells. ■ During your opponent's turn, if your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, your opponent puts that creature into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-20 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Magic Tool

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dolszak/Mafi Gang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GATE OF MOONLESS NIGHT}: When you put a Magic Tool, you may choose 2 of your Magic Tools in the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ If there are 4 or more cards under this creature, your opponent's creatures are put tapped.

property.name: Rarity

card.name: Bangetsu 卍 Ga Ryuzark 卍 / Bangokusatsu

property.name: Name1
property.value: Bangetsu 卍 Ga Ryuzark 卍

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dolszak/Mafi Gang

property.name: Race1
property.value: Master Dolszak/Mafi Gang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gate of Moonless Night Zetsu: At the end of each turn, you may choose a total of 6 Magic Tools from your graveyard or battle zone and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard on top of them for no cost. ■ At the start of your opponent's turn, they can't untap more than 3 cards in their mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER} TWINPACT ■ Destroy all creatures. ■ If the total number of cards in each player's graveyards are 13 or more, and this spell is in your shields, it has "shield trigger".

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Destroy all creatures. ■ If the total number of cards in each player's graveyards are 13 or more, and this spell is in your shields, it has "shield trigger".

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-20 Game Designers Selection Deck: Water Darkness Magic Tool

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may cast this spell from your graveyard, If you do, after you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.. ■Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it: ► Put a darkness creature that costs 4 or less or a darkness aura that costs 4 or less from your graveyard: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose a darkness card from your graveyard and put it into your hand. ■ Your Magic Tool creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.
